actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill for the relief of Joseph-Paul Ferraro and Weiner Broadcasting Company.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Communications Commission to modify the license of a specified radio station to authorize a named individual and company to own and operate such station, on its assigned frequency, for noncommercial radio broadcasting.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Joseph-Paul Ferraro and Weiner Broadcasting Company.
